Footer.leadway: We are the leader in the heavy machinery business with reputation that is widely accepted in the heavy industry circle throughout the world.
Footer.follow: follow news and promotions from us.

Jgm.rubber_wheel: Rubber wheels can go on all areas.

financial.title: FINANCIAL SERVICES
financial.description: The company provides consulting and leasing services through leading financial institutions. Makes it convenient for customers to use heavy machinery. with leasing conditions suitable for cash flow and flexible payments.

after_sale.title: AFTER-SALES SERVICES
after_sale.description: Focus on developing a team of engineers and expert technicians. With training, maintenance, problem analysis, and usage checks. To provide advice and quality after-sales service.

spare.title: SPARE PARTS
spare.description: Provide genuine spare parts certified by official manufacturers, for adherence to quality and confidence in driving the work system.

customer.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer.description: Provide basic machine information, recommend sales consultants, inform promotion details, and provide the best benefits for customers.

hotline.title: THE LEADWAY HOTLINE
hotline.description: LEADWAY MOBILE SERVICE with a team of expert technicians ready to provide urgent service at the location.

service_centers.title: SERVICE CENTERS
service_centers.description: There are 15 service centers nationwide for peace of mind and convenience in contacting, with teams and experts providing service and assistance with modern tools.
